text: "Chained to You" is a 2000 song by Australian pop duo Savage Garden and is the fifth single from their second studio album Affirmation. It went to number 16 on the Australian charts and no music video was made. ==Track listings== Australia # "Chained to You" – 4:08 # "Affirmation" (live in Brisbane, May 2000) – 5:44 # "I Want You" (live in Brisbane, May 2000) – 3:55 # "I Knew I Loved You" (live in Brisbane, May 2000) – 8:23 Europe # "Chained to You" – 4:08 # "Affirmation" (live in Brisbane, May 2000) – 5:44 ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Savage Garden songs
title: Chained to You
